com.mcc.ul
Class NetConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.mcc.ul.NetConfig

public class NetConfig
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to get or set configuration of a Network DAQ device. To create an instance of this class, call the getNetConfig() method of the DaqDeviceConfig class.

Method Summary
 java.net.InetAddress getAddress()
          Returns the IP address of the DAQ device. For remote devices, returns the IP address of the host connected to the device.
 int getConnectionCode()
          Returns the connection code.
 int getConnectionTimeout()
          Returns the connection timeout in milliseconds.

          Returns the default Gateway address.

          Returns the default Subnet Mask.
 java.net.InetAddress getGatewayAddress()
          Returns the current Gateway address.
 java.net.InterfaceAddress getInterfaceAddress()
          Returns the interface address used to communicate with the device.
 int getIoTimeout()
          Returns the I/O timeout in milliseconds.
 IPAddressSetting getIPAddressSetting()
          Returns an IPAddressSetting enumeration indicating the IP address setting for the device.

          Returns the current Subnet Mask.
